website_summaries.verdict: This dryer is just the right size for traveling. However, it can provide problems if traveling overseas.
pros: Small, compact, and lightweight, it's a powerful unit that dries hair fast
cons: A switch needs to be flipped for overseas use, but it still needs a converter and doesn't always work in that situation

customer_reviews.title: Does not work at 50 Hz (Europe, Israel, etc.)
customer_reviews.text: The description says this is dual voltage, and it is, but it doesn't say that it works only at 60 Hz (60 cycles). The electricity in Europe, Israel, and lots of other places is 50 Hz. For those places you need a dryer that is dual voltage AND 50/60 Hz. The product description is misleading because it doesn't say that it is 60 Hz only. I returned it and bought one that is dual voltage and 50/60 Hz.
customer_reviews.author: Gladys W

customer_reviews.title: THIS WAS THE BIGGEST PIECE OF CRAP EVER! WORKED FOR LITERALLY ONE SECOND
customer_reviews.text: THIS WAS THE BIGGEST PIECE OF CRAP EVER! WORKED FOR LITERALLY ONE SECOND!!! I THREW IT AWAY SO I DIDN'T HAVE TO LUG IT AROUND ITALY. I MADE SURE IT WAS ON THE RIGHT VOLTAGE FOR ITALY. HAD A GOOD NEW ADAPTER FOR THE PLUG, HAD IT ON LOW AS INSTRUCTED. IT CAME ON AND DIED IN LESS THAN ONE SECOND!!! YOU OWE ME A FULL REFUND, PLUS SOME EXTRA FOR MY BAD HAIR IN MY PICTURES!!!! :( -KRISTAL C.
customer_reviews.author: Travis Crites

customer_reviews.title: Cant recommend enough
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little hairdryer! I took it to the UK with me a few months ago. So happy with it. It runs on high speed on the higher voltage. I also took my $20 purple Remington straightners. They have dual voltage too. All you need is a plug converter. I've actually been getting my hair dryer faster with this than my usual dryer (probably because it's much lighter), so I've ditched my normal dryer for now and have been using this exclusively. I plan on using this on trips and weekends within the US too.
customer_reviews.author: S.W.

customer_reviews.title: I like how light -weight this dryer is
customer_reviews.text: I like how light -weight this dryer is! Plus, it is very powerful. I like that it has the ability to do a "Cool shot". Helps set your style and cool the dryer off before you shut if off. I will say, if you don't hold it away from you head, the air will get VERY hot. Make sure you hold it about 12 inches from your head. It's not as noisy as my old dryer, but it does seem to have a high-pitch ring that will linger for a few seconds after you turn it off. Overally, I am very pleased with this hair dryer.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth Simon

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after <4 mos
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this hairdryer when we first received it - good size, good power, and folds up for traveling. But it just stopped working after having it for less than 4 months. There should be a better return policy for things purchased through Amazon when they don't last for the expected life of a product.
customer_reviews.author: Emily A.

customer_reviews.title: Great for travel!
customer_reviews.text: Took this with me to Ireland. So glad I did, hotel dryers are not the best. It was fast, a little loud. One reviewer mentioned it was hard to switch between 110 to 250. Used prong on the end of the cord. Easy! Only wish it came with a nozzle attachment.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best compact hair dryer
customer_reviews.text: I keep buying this same Conair 1875 Watt compact hair dryer every time my old one dies or I inadvertently leave it someplace while traveling. This has been going on for over 20 years. It's that good! It is small enough to travel with, especially since it neatly folds in half, yet it is extremely powerful. We use it every day and it has been very reliable. I hope Conair never stops making this little gem! Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: J. Zepf

customer_reviews.title: Portable, yet as good as a full-size hairdryer
customer_reviews.text: Used this on a cruise - you really need to bring your own - and it worked like a champ. Dried my hair in no time but did not dry it out. It has a low and high setting, but when you press the cool shot button it brings the setting to something like medium which I used pretty much the whole time. This was perfect for my hair which is fine in texture and a medium length. It held up to daily use. Impressed as to how well it treated my hair.
customer_reviews.author: Mary AnneTop Contributor: Harmonicas

customer_reviews.title: Not dual voltage, despite what it says
customer_reviews.text: The one time I used it with a converter it seemed fine. Then I remembered it was dual voltage so I did not need a converter- or so I thought. As soon as I turned it on there was a spark and it was useless. Although this product claims to be dual voltage, not just in the product description but on the product itself, it is NOT DUAL VOLTAGE.
customer_reviews.author: Riva Kelton

customer_reviews.title: Falls Apart on Use
customer_reviews.text: This item falls apart early in its working life. I have recently had two of these units and both fell apart on use. Both quickly developed cracks and breaks during use. First, the sliding power switch breaks off. Then pieces of the housing break off and the front grill falls out. I am sure neither unit was dropped nor damaged by our use. I will not buy this one again. Amazon should not be selling this item.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph H. Francis

customer_reviews.title: Can't use on high overseas -- and low didn't work either!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this as I was going to Europe. It's bad enough that the small print states that you can't use it on high when you're overseas. But to try to use it on low and then it doesn't work at all is beyond aggravating. It works here in the U.S., but I already have a dryer. This was a complete waste of money. I wish I was still within the return window to get my money back. Very annoying.
customer_reviews.author: GoneGirl

customer_reviews.title: I also do like the cold shot function
customer_reviews.text: I use this at home. It works well, high heat setting isn't too hot and dries my hair quickly. I also do like the cold shot function. t's not as small as other travel hairdryers but is definitely portable if you wish to pack it with you. I took off a star because I saw the almost exact same version (same functions, wattage, foldable) being sold on the Target website for $5 less...so this isn't exactly an 'Amazon Exclusive'. Had I known, I would have bought from Target instead.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as I had hoped...
customer_reviews.text: Slightly disappointed in that some pieces of the dryer have fallen off. It is still working but it should not have happen so easier. I would have to think twice before I would ever purchase another Conair again. Lastly, it does handle the dual voltage I needed with no problems; the main reason I purchased the item.
customer_reviews.author: Michael S.

customer_reviews.title: Maggots... Maggots in my box!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: When I received the package it was very beat up and looked like it had gotten wet. I thought the hair dryer would probably be fine so I opened the package and Ahhh. The whole inside of the box looked like it eaten away and then I saw a ton of little bugs. I think maggots but honestly I can’t be 100% sure what kind of bug. Needless to say I am returning the product...
customer_reviews.author: Plsno

customer_reviews.title: A great little hair dryer!
customer_reviews.text: This little gizmo does it all. It is very light and easy to use, has a Cool air button, and has dual voltage for travel. I haven't tried the dual voltage yet, but it does a great job with my long, curly hair.
customer_reviews.author: GMB

customer_reviews.title: Performs well,easy to travel with.
customer_reviews.text: I highly recommend this hair dryer! It performs well; I have owned mine for over a year, it is still performing as if new. It is lightweight; Small enough that it is a pleasure to include in one's travels. It folds nicely; It is not obnoxiously loud. Well-made product!
customer_reviews.author: Ana Calzadilla

customer_reviews.title: Conair 1875 Watt Compact Hairdryer with Folding Handle, Dual Voltage Travel Hair Dryer, Grey
customer_reviews.text: I love this hairdryer. It's lightweight with a lot of power. I love the cool shot feature for setting a curl. My hair would get pulled into the air intake on some dryers I've purchased but not with this dyer. Folds for suitcase or storage. Absolutely perfect.
customer_reviews.author: TwoCentsTomlinsonTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Worked once then didn't turn back on
customer_reviews.text: This item ended up being a waste of space in my limited carry on when I traveled to Europe. I had to pay 5 pounds a day to use the hotels hairdryer in London because this dryer decided to briefly turn on once and then go off never to work again. The worst part is that I had to lug it with me to Rome (where it also didnt work) and back to the United States so I could return it to get my money back. Very frustrated with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Castro

customer_reviews.title: Very powerful for the size!
customer_reviews.text: I have long thick hair and hate washing a drying my hair during vacation!!! However with this compact blow dryer I can do a wash and blow dry in no time!!! A must when you travel. Remember those hotel hairdryers never work properly and are made for people with very little hair.... I highly recommend and the price was right!
customer_reviews.author: Gustave

customer_reviews.title: Bought this Jan. 22, 2016 - just used ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this Jan. 22, 2016 - just used it occasionally for travel. Maybe once a week and it quit working today. Feb. 20, 2017. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Debra E. Bunch

customer_reviews.title: Great little hairdryer!!
customer_reviews.text: This travel dual voltage hair dryer was awesome! I traveled to Switzerland and Italy with it. You will need a plug adapter in addition to it's dual voltage capabilities. I tried out the dryer at home on the 120 setting and all was well. Use either a screwdriver or common kitchen knife to turn the little dial on the handle to 250 for Europe. That's it! When it's on 250 you should only run the dryer on low, but that is the same as the high setting on the 120 voltage. The best things about this dryer are the folding handle to make it small and the cool shot button. This is one great little hairdryer!!
customer_reviews.author: LJM

customer_reviews.title: Best travel dryer!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second purchase of this exact hair dryer. I travel constantly and prefer my own hair dryer to those in hotels...some long, some short, some good, most not so good. This folds up, fits in my carry-on and also is perfect when I am home. It is exactly what I was looking for, both the first time I bought it and this time. Very good product!
customer_reviews.author: Bissie

customer_reviews.title: Great little dryer
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a replacement for the dryer I had used for years. My requirements were that it be... 1. Compact, 2. Powerful, and 3. Relatively quiet. It met all three!
customer_reviews.author: Ms.Adams

customer_reviews.title: Defects in assembly?
customer_reviews.text: I returned this item along with a duplicate that was sent in error. Both of the dryers that were received had the same imperfection of not being well joined together along the top seam. Poor workmanship or damaged somehow in storage or shipment? I felt that if it were dropped or hit on something it would come completely apart easily. Also, my hair got caught up in that space (between the seam) while attempting to use. I should note that I have used Conair compact dryers for a number of yrs. and have always been very satisfied with their quality, performance and longevity. Very disappointed that "both" dryers had the same defect!
customer_reviews.author: Linda HayesNAME_NOT_RETURNED

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 12 year old son so he'd stop using my hair dryer all the time. For him, I wanted something small and easy to use, and this has worked out great. He says he likes it. He doesn't need any special features, but I like that if we go on a family trip we can bring this dryer if we need to, instead of my big bulky one. I also liked the neutral color of this dryer. So many of the ones out there were bright, typically girly colors. It's been a month or 2 and has been used everyday with no problems.
customer_reviews.author: Claud

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Great, affordable Conair hair dryer. It does not get too hot so it is gentle to the hair. I always have two of the 1875 model, one for home and one in my traveling bag.
customer_reviews.author: JEC

customer_reviews.title: had it for years, use it to travel and at home
customer_reviews.text: At home I don't often dry my hair or if I do I just zap it for a few minutes with this thing. It works well. I've taken it on a few trips, but wouldn't want to backpack across Europe with it. Powerful, works well. No complaints. Cord is long enough for most spaces.
customer_reviews.author: M. Mayer

customer_reviews.title: Dual voltage but not powerful
customer_reviews.text: I usually buy Panasonic hairdryers but got this one for the dual voltage and easy storage. The size is good for travel but it is louder and heavier than what I use to. Also, it may not be powerful enough to dry thick hairs quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Worked as expected
customer_reviews.text: This hair dryer worked exactly as expected in London. You have to change the power setting and it works only on low (which I expected) but otherwise had no problems. Note, I didn’t try to style my hair but it was dry which was great for 40 degree weather. It’s nice and compact so it doesn’t take up much room in your luggage. Will definitely use this again.
customer_reviews.author: ccz77

customer_reviews.title: In the first place...
customer_reviews.text: Nice compact size that folds. My wife loves it and have had no issues with it yet. The only reason I didn't give it five stars is because I couldn't convince my wife that the hotel we were going to was going to have a hair dryer for her anyway. Why was whizzed off that I had to buy this in the first place
customer_reviews.author: BBG

customer_reviews.title: Very powerful and handy
customer_reviews.text: We use it for grooming our pet, every day and after each bath. It is light, powerful and easy to store. Just note that the heat control (high-off-low) only changes the fan speed. So you are only limited to either high fan speed which is the high heat as well, or the low fan speed which gives you lower heat. So if you need high fan speed with low heat, you cannot do it with this product. But it has the "chill" button that work on both fan speeds.
customer_reviews.author: Srt

customer_reviews.title: A good replacement that can be used at home or while travelling
customer_reviews.text: We trust the Conair brand. This little 1875 Watt Dryer is compact and depending upon speed, quietly provides a good volume of air. We will be using this for home and travel.
customer_reviews.author: JPerryE

customer_reviews.title: Excellent little dryer. Just what I needed.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent little dryer. Compact. The high setting is good and hot. I used mine for melting beeswax onto leather shoes and boots. Don’t need a dryer for my hair.
customer_reviews.author: Eric F

customer_reviews.title: Works great in Europe and the US!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used it in both Europe and the states. Works well in both voltages. The high speed option doesn’t work in Europe. But all you need is the regular speed. I was using my personal hair dryer instead of the hotel’s because it was just so much better. And it takes only a little space. I was traveling with just a carry-on suitcase and this hair dryer was just perfect!
customer_reviews.author: sm

customer_reviews.title: WORKED PERFECTLY ON MY TRIP TO EUROPE!!
customer_reviews.text: This hair dryer worked perfectly on my trip to Europe!! Even on the low setting this dryer had way more power than any of the European dryers that were available. It isn't extremely compact or lightweight, but it was definitely small enough to fit in my luggage without taking up much room. Don't forget to change the voltage setting on the dryer before using. I forgot, but luckily it has a built in kill switch that prevents the dryer from blowing out. I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: LindseyLove

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for irks travel!
customer_reviews.text: Works super well. Took to to Europe and South America. When you switch voltage you can only run it on low. It still has good power and better than any hotel hair dryer that you’ll find out of the country. Also perfect to take to the gym. On US voltage setting it can run on low and high.
customer_reviews.author: Claus Mino

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work on low speed with the 220 volt setting
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice dryer and it is plenty powerful. The thin Ig don't like is that when I took it to Europe and used it on the 220 volt setting, it would only work on high - didn't work at all on low.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Sawyer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for travel
customer_reviews.text: Loved so much for traveling that I bought one as my regular home hair dryer !
customer_reviews.author: fran

customer_reviews.title: I was very happy to have a guaranteed blow dryer instead of relying ...
customer_reviews.text: This worked perfectly in Europe with the higher voltage outlets. Use a scewdriver to move the switch from the 110 to 220 volts and you'll have no problem. I was very happy to have a guaranteed blow dryer instead of relying on iffy hotel dryers.
customer_reviews.author: Jen from KC

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!1
customer_reviews.text: Haven't had it long but so far it's working great. My favorite think about it is its small size with no sacrifice to its output. Was able to order a small wall-mounted holder that easily holds the dryer & hairbrush and keeps this stuff off my sink area.
customer_reviews.author: Traveling Gal

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight, foldable, dual voltage for travel
customer_reviews.text: If you travel alot to other countries, this is very useful as it is small, foldable as well as able to be used in countries using 220v. A bit noisy, but extremely powerful.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Huang

customer_reviews.title: Long lasting, well engineered dryer.
customer_reviews.text: A year later with heavy use from my wife, this hair dryer is still going strong. Do not hesitate to buy this if you are thinking about it.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Bonkers

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: I just received this and am already in love with it. Perfect compact folded size, heats quickly, powerful motor. However the thing I like most is the removable air intake filter on the back, similar to a window screen mesh, that can be twisted off (counter clockwise) and cleaned. I previously went through three other types without air filters, which were difficult to clean, even with an air compressor, and eventually clogged and burned out.
customer_reviews.author: Darob

customer_reviews.title: Not ionic. Will cause frizz if you're prone to it. Fast but loud.
customer_reviews.text: This hair dryer is not ionic and caused frizz. I didn't think I believed in ionic technology until I used this hair dryer. It dried my hair fast, but I looked like Sideshow Bob afterwards because of the frizz. I bit the bullet and purchased a $130 "ionic", blah blah blah hair dryer and it performed a miracle. My hair had zero frizz after using the expensive one. I'm ditching this one.
customer_reviews.author: Jonesie

customer_reviews.title: Powerful little thing.
customer_reviews.text: Great little hairdryer. Powerful and compact. Just be careful about putting a sock-diffuser on it if you use it for curly/wavy hair. It might overheat and shutoff. The best past of it is the dual-voltage switch.
customer_reviews.author: Toothpick FactoryTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my mom, replacing an old travel hair dryer from the 1900’s !! Easy to use and not heavy.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Light to hold...a plus
customer_reviews.text: It works like a hair dryer should! Yes it's smaller than a full size BUT that's why I like it. Go for it...you'll like it :-)
customer_reviews.author: sandy101

customer_reviews.title: Great blow dryer
customer_reviews.text: I bought this hair dryer for traveling. It has a lot of power compared to the hotel dryers and is much smaller than a conventional blow dryer. Really like it.
customer_reviews.author: Jean Blundell

customer_reviews.title: Loving this - great for travel or gym bag.
customer_reviews.text: Works great, even in Europe (with proper outlet adapter). Quite powerful for such a small hair dryer. Works way better than the low-powered (almost always broken) ones in hotel rooms. Folds up to be pretty compact. Great for travel or for keeping in your gym bag. The only thing that would make this better is if it had one of those narrow nozzle attachments, but for the reasonable price this one is a winner for me.
customer_reviews.author: H

customer_reviews.title: Conair 1875 Watt Compact Hair Dryer
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic purchase, very satisfied. Great quality, definitely will buy again from this seller, great price, fast delivery.
customer_reviews.author: d2chin

customer_reviews.title: Did not hold up
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this and was initially very happy. I have had this product for less than one year, and it has stopped working properly. Now, when I use it in warm (not hot) weather, the temperature sensor thinks it is too hot and shuts the hair dryer off. This happens after about 30 seconds of use on the high setting. After about 2 minutes, you can audibly hear the temperature sensor reset itself, after which you can use it again for about 30 more seconds. Very disappointing. I am having to order another hair dryer.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: This works for guy’s
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice small lightweight dryer that works for me; I’m a guy and can’t speak to the drying power for women. In any event I can recommend it for guy’s.
customer_reviews.author: T. F. WhiteTop Contributor: Watches

customer_reviews.title: Didn't last a year...
customer_reviews.text: I only had this unit less than a year when it broke. I liked it while it was working. Only used it once a day for 5-6 minutes, so to me it was not overused. I used to have one very similar from Conair. I guess things are not made as they used to be. I am going to try to contact Conair to see if they'll do anything.
customer_reviews.author: K. Caldwell

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a travel hairdryer to take on a trip to Europe. I chose this one because it has dual voltage, is foldable, and is available through Amazon Prime for quick shipping. It is rather bulky, but I suppose if it were smaller it wouldn't have the power and other nice features like the speed settings and "cool" button. It performed perfectly on the trip (with the addition of a tiny outlet adapter) and is comfortable to hold. Now I keep it in my gym bag. Overall, I recommend this if you want a somewhat more compact but still powerful dryer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not too small, sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This hair dryer is a little larger than another Conair I have, but I like the fact that is feels a bit more substantial and it seems to have more power. I purchased this from a "Warehouse Deal", which I assume means it was purchased and returned and not being resold. If I had any concerns about that, I don't any longer. It arrived in perfect condition and I saved about 7 bucks.
customer_reviews.author: A.J.

customer_reviews.title: Great for travel
customer_reviews.text: I bought this dryer for when we travel because no hotel or cruise hairdryer would ever dry my hair. This is quite powerful and did a great job of drying my think, curly hair. It folds up very small to take up less space in a suitcase.
customer_reviews.author: chrelaine

customer_reviews.title: Nice compact dual wattage travel hair dryer
customer_reviews.text: A little bit smaller than my Sharper Image one that has served me well for many years but just died recently. Hopefully if it lasts as long (more than 5 years) that I would be real please. Has very similar features as my old one. Like: End cap just unscrew for removing lint and dust. Cool blast. Cord slightly shorter (almost 5 feet) which is even better for traveling and packing. Dislike: No hair dryer hanger loop like my old one. Reserve one less star for long term durability test.
customer_reviews.author: Rlam

customer_reviews.title: Used for trip to Ireland
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a trip to Ireland so I wouldn't burn out my normal hair dryer. As long as you make sure to change the voltage on the little dial before you plug it in everything should work fine. I did make sure to only use the dryer on the low setting which seemed like what you would normally consider high. Everything worked great and I didn't have any issues.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy Z

customer_reviews.title: Powerful and Convenient....
customer_reviews.text: Took this to Italy... it was lightweight, compact and did a great job. Packs a big punch for a small dryer, and the dual voltage was so easy to adjust. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: mlp

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for traveling to Europe!
customer_reviews.text: This hair dryer was perfect for our trip to Germany! It is small, but powerful! Barely took up room in my suitcase and works great! Just make sure to follow the directions and turn to the appropriate voltage. When on the 250 voltage your low setting will be high.
customer_reviews.author: Laura G.

customer_reviews.title: Powerful and light weight
customer_reviews.text: Powerful and light weight. Drys hair as fast as any dryer I have ever used. Lighter by at least 40% compared to my previous Conair travel dryer. I travel a lot...over 100K miles in the last 7 years. The final test will be longevity.
customer_reviews.author: LV Artist

customer_reviews.title: finally fabulous dryer
customer_reviews.text: i'm a guy and don't usually rate hair dryers, but this by far is the best dryer i've ever used. the ionic technology actually cuts drying time if half, it seems. i have a large bushy handlebar mustache and curl it with a dryer after a shower. this works great. small, compact, good controls and cool shot in exactly right place. if i designed hair dryers, i couldn't do any better then this. since models change all the time and seem to get worse, noy better. i ordered 4
customer_reviews.author: bajarickster

customer_reviews.title: Does a good job. Be aware that when using the international ...
customer_reviews.text: Does a good job. Be aware that when using the international voltage, the switch only moes to the low position. I thought there was something wrong and so I tried it when we returned from Europe and placed in the 120v position the switch was selectable for both low and high heat settings. Didn't seem to matter as it did a quick job on the low while on the trp
customer_reviews.author: dogafterdarkdog

customer_reviews.title: I used it in Paris and liked it very much
customer_reviews.text: I did a lot of research on European travel hairdryers and this one consistently got high reviews. I used it in Paris and liked it very much. It is very strong and dries my thick hair as quickly as the hairdryer I use at home. It doesn't get too hot or get that burning smell that some hairdryers get in Europe. I recommend buying this one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Dual Voltage Hair Dryer
customer_reviews.text: Used this hair dryer on 220V @ 50 hz for two weeks in Ireland. Used adapter, not transformer. Worked as good or better than any hair dryer that I have ever used. My wife now uses it daily in the US.
customer_reviews.author: JLW

customer_reviews.title: Full of Hot (and cool) Air !!
customer_reviews.text: I love this little dryer! Doesn't take up much space, works well, and I love the "Cool Air" button that blows air without the heating element on. Perfect for home (where I really use it) or travel.
customer_reviews.author: Paolo Panimus

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great product. It lasted a long time then I bought another one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Happy I chose this one
customer_reviews.text: Great little hair dryer for travel or the home. Works great, is very lightweight and easy to store.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Performs as hoped
customer_reviews.text: Have had the same model for over 10 years and still love it. I presume this newer version will last the same
customer_reviews.author: Gregs

customer_reviews.title: This is fantastic - it works so much better than my "industrial" ...
customer_reviews.text: This is fantastic - it works so much better than my "industrial" sized one! I got this to travel next week, but I love it so much I've been using it as my main dryer. It's puts out a LOT of air, and with the right amount of heat to style with my round brush. It dries my hair a lot faster. It also doesn't sound like a jet engine:)
customer_reviews.author: PattySJ

customer_reviews.title: Compact, but not for long use.
customer_reviews.text: For a quick dry in the mornings, it's great. Not terribly loud or forceful; it does the job, and was under $20. However, when I use it on our 12lb dog post-bath, it overheats/shuts off after about 3 mins of use. (Our old one never did.) So: Great for short hair, not so great for long hair/pets. Not sure if that's a deal-breaker for you or not. 4-stars, but -1 for overheat. We're landing on 3-stars, everyone!
customer_reviews.author: Jason G.

customer_reviews.title: Blew up in Berlin
customer_reviews.text: I bought this hair dryer to ise in Europe last year and had no problems. I left it there to jave room for souvenirs. I bought it again to take this year and it fizzled out after less than 2 weeks. My advice is buy one when you get to Europe or ise the omes in the hotel.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey McIntyre

customer_reviews.title: Good product for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this hair dryer for a recent trip I took to Europe (Italy and Austria) and it mostly worked great. I had problems in a couple hotels, but I think it's because of the plug adapter I used (it wouldn't stay plugged in). For the price, I would recommend this product for international travel. If you purchase this hair dryer, be sure to read the instructions and not use it on the "high" setting. The "low" setting is more than enough power.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara G.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for travel
customer_reviews.text: European hotels do not have blow dryers Great lightweight and compact for travel Needs special adapter for Europe
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect hairdryer
customer_reviews.text: Got this for the wife! She really likes the power and ability to dry her hair in a short time
customer_reviews.author: Bobby D

customer_reviews.title: Worked well in Turkey
customer_reviews.text: We used it on 220 in Turkey and it worked very well. I also is great that it folds up to fit in to the suitcase for traveling. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Big Kid

customer_reviews.title: Small but powerful
customer_reviews.text: This hairdryer worked great in Greece. It is small and easy to pack yet has the power of a standard size hairdryer. I used the Orei plug adapter with this hairdryer.
customer_reviews.author: Mimi B.

customer_reviews.title: Great hair dryer
customer_reviews.text: I got this compact hair dryer to replace the same model, which I'd had for a decade or two but the cord started to wear. I found my old one to be very reliable and with a surprisingly strong air flow for the compact size of the dryer. I'd taken it on several dozen trips and used it at home often as well. This new one seems to be of equally good quality and has all the features I'd liked on my old one. I was so glad Conair still makes it!
customer_reviews.author: PatCali500

customer_reviews.title: My big complaint is that when you want low speed ...
customer_reviews.text: My big complaint is that when you want low speed air you also get considerably less heat. I would prefer a travel drier that has the big drier feature of low speed air w/ higher heat.
customer_reviews.author: SD

customer_reviews.title: Small but mighty
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my trip to Scotland and worked great, works great in US too. A small, lightweight hair dryer that is pretty mighty. I don't use it on a daily, normal basis, but for travel it's great!!
customer_reviews.author: Sherry A

customer_reviews.title: Great for styling fine hair.
customer_reviews.text: Effective for styling fine hair during travel. This replaces the same model I had for more than 5 years, which finally lost its high heat setting. There is enough heat and force to style my fine hair, which is beyond most hotel-supplied dryers. This is lighter and smaller than the previous models.
customer_reviews.author: Mumsers

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for a trip to Paris. When I tested it at home it had tow speeds but when I used it in the apartment in Paris, after switching the voltage, it only had one speed, high. It worked fine for drying my hair but was too strong to do any "styling." The nozzle is wider than what I'd have liked but if all you're interested in is drying your hair or if you use a high speed for styling this is fine.
customer_reviews.author: Eileen G.

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't last long
customer_reviews.text: I bought this just over a year ago. It worked great for our trip - I really like the dual voltage option. The dryer worked so well for me that used it regularly after our trip. Now it just stopped working for no good reason. I know it didn't cost much, but I have never had a hair dryer last only a year. I am so disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie G.

customer_reviews.title: I used this in Peru and I’m very happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as I travel internationally quite a bit and sometimes the hotels I stay in don’t have hairdryers. I used this in Peru and I’m very happy with my purchase. It worked really well on my hair which is thick and can be difficult/time consuming to dry. It fit into my carry on and was easy to travel with. I would def recommend this product to my friends who travel a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Beth Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Great for travel to Europe
customer_reviews.text: I took this on my trip to Italy and it worked great! It's lightweight and dries well.
customer_reviews.author: Julie E

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done
customer_reviews.text: I like that it’s lightweight and plenty of power. Would have been a five star if it would have a coiled cord.
customer_reviews.author: Clyde Antrobus

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Not a bad little blow dryer. Folds up nice and small and has more power than I thought it would. Wish it had a diffuser for the end, but that was not a game changer.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Have bought this hair dryer in the past and never had any issues. Had to return the first one because the high setting didn't work. The second one I received worked for about a month but then the plug broke.
customer_reviews.author: jkvy88

customer_reviews.title: Only one setting at the voltage 250V setting
customer_reviews.text: It is very well made and satisfies the appearance and proper weight. But when the voltage is 250V, it is not low or high and it is unsatisfactory to have only one setting
customer_reviews.author: S.M. Kang

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Europe trip
customer_reviews.text: Suggested when I purchased adapter plugs for a trip to France. Easy to switch with a screwdriver, so still using n the US. Strong, powerful. In France, only had one speed.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Price

customer_reviews.title: Light and Effective
customer_reviews.text: I have no complaints. I like it better than my big, heavy ionic dryer--seems to dry faster. This is like the ones often provided in hotels. It's light and easy to pack. I highly recommend--wish it had a hook on it to hang in my bathroom but it folds small and fits easily in a drawer or suitcase
customer_reviews.author: Osa

customer_reviews.title: It get's very hot already but I've never had one burn out like other brands
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this little powerhouse since 2002 and just now on my third Conair. It Last's a long time and was thankful it was still around so I purchased two this time. Just make sure you turn the air intake cap counterclock wise to clean out the lint that's caught on the grate or it becomes to hot. It get's very hot already but I've never had one burn out like other brands.
customer_reviews.author: ANNIE

customer_reviews.title: It's a bit bigger than I would have liked, I was looking for a really compact travel ...
customer_reviews.text: It's a bit bigger than I would have liked, I was looking for a really compact travel hair dryer. My bushy beard can make or break my appearance by being either wild/homeless, or groomed/noble. My beard is all the vanity I have.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Great for travel!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this dryer to take on my recent trip to Florida. Very light weight and fits well in travel bag. Works well😁 quick delivery, products looks as shown in pic.
customer_reviews.author: Ami

customer_reviews.title: It is light and sturdy. I was surprised how powerful it is
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for a vacation to Europe and wanted something very light. It is light and sturdy. I was surprised how powerful it is, and it has a cool setting. The only thing I would improve would be to build it with a retractable cord. But I guess it would be heavier then.
customer_reviews.author: Explorer

customer_reviews.title: Used it for the first time today and I love it. It's tiny but very powerful
customer_reviews.text: Used it for the first time today and I love it. It's tiny but very powerful. The buttons are easy to access and adjust while you're using it. The folding handle seems like it is sturdy enough that it won't fold up on me while I'm using it. I bought it because of the dual voltage for an upcoming trip overseas, but I like it better than the one I've been using. I think I'll use this all the time, not just when traveling.
customer_reviews.author: IGotItOnAmazon

customer_reviews.title: Every time I use the cold mode, there is ...
customer_reviews.text: Every time I use the cold mode, there is a burning smell coming from it, either it's cause it's still new or what... will update as I continue to use to see if the smell goes away. So far it's doing it job. It does get really hot and have to use 8-inch at least away from head and face, as long as my hair gets dried.
customer_reviews.author: Kylie

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly surprised
customer_reviews.text: I am very particular on hair dryers. So I was very skeptical on a traveling one. Very pleasantly surprised. I used it in the Netherlands and Belgium. Only one speed worked in those countries, which was high but the setting was low. But that's all I needed it for so it suited me just fine. The size was compact as a travel model should.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn A

customer_reviews.title: Product that lives up to what it is used for
customer_reviews.text: Works great. This is the second I purchased from Conair. First lasted over 10 years
customer_reviews.author: Rich G

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: Meh. I've only used it a few times. It has already started making a weird noise when I turn it off. Time will tell. I've had better.
customer_reviews.author: S King Fan

product_meta.title: Conair 1875 Watt Compact Hair Dryer with Folding Handle, Dual Voltage Travel Hair Dryer, Grey
product_meta.description:
Color:Grey

The Conair 1875 Watt Compact Hair Dryer with Folding Handle is compact and lightweight for easy and convenient travel. Featuring great style on the go with this small but strong Conair travel hair dryer. Backed by 1875 watts of hair drying power, dual voltage and an ergonomic folding handle, this compact, lightweight and portable hair dryer is ready to join you on your journey. Easy to pack, easy to store. This Conair 1875 hair dryer even features dual voltage for travel around the world.* With 2 heat and speed settings, this blow dryer was created for all hair types, and the cool shot button helps lock curls, waves and style in place. 
*Travel adapter not included
feature_bullets: The Conair 1875 Watt Compact Hair Dryer with Folding Handle is perfect for storage in small spaces, as well as worldwide travel
2 heat / speed settings for all hair types
Cool Shot locks curls, waves and style in place
Compact, lightweight and portable hair dryer
Travel hair dryer with dual voltage - great for global travel

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
